title: Client problems (Again)
body:
Now I have in game issues where i'm attempting to reconnect every couple of minutes although I have a constant ms of 14~, I have problems with Disconnecting fro pvp.net, And although I don't have any other programs open I still can go from 40 fps to 0 in a second. I have the hextech repair tool logs but have no idea how to upload them.

Thank You for your assistance, Manny1322

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection to our server, and possibly suffering from packet loss.  As a first step, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article to go over a series of troubleshooting steps.  Hopefully, this will tune up the strength of your connection and fix you up!

http://n2.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=36a470be-22433-97cf9f37-d843-4659-82cd

What is this? How do i fix any of this? Oh god plz
It's an analysis of your network that can help specialists get context, and nothing to be scared of.  Have you gone through each step of the guide, and still having issues?
Yes all my ports are forwarded i changed my clock time to automatic but its still late by 26 seconds/7 seconds (It changes randomly) I submitted a support ticket yesterday and i'm waiting for a reply
